name: Allen Brain Observatory Neuropixels recording
citation: Allen Brain Observatory Neuropixels recording (2022). (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/000030/draft
description: A Neuropixels recording from a head-fixed mouse acquired at the Allen Institute for Brain Science. The recording has a duration of 15 minutes, 246 active recording channels (the remaining of the 384 Neuropixels channels were either not inserted in the brain tissue or below a firing rate of 0.1~Hz), and a sampling frequency of 30~kHz. The probe records from part of the cortex (V1), the hippocampus (CA1), the dentate gyrus, and the thalamus (LP).
